00001 /* 
00002  * jcom.hub - internals
00003  * manage internal objects that are hosted within the hub for a module
00004  * By Tim Place, Copyright © 2007
00005  * 
00006  * License: This code is licensed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
00007  * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html

00009 
00010 #include "jcom.hub.h"
00011 
00012 
00013 class hubInternalObject {
00014         private:
00015         t_object        *theObject;
00016         
00017         public:
00018         method          action;
00019         
00020         hubInternalObject(char *classname, char *subscribername, char *subscribertype, char *ramptype, char *description)
00021         {
00022                 t_atom          a[7];
00023         
00024                 theObject = NULL;
00025                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym(subscribername));
00026                 atom_setsym(a+1, gensym("@type"));
00027                 atom_setsym(a+2, gensym(subscribertype));
00028                 atom_setsym(a+3, gensym("@ramp/drive"));
00029                 atom_setsym(a+4, gensym(ramptype));
00030                 atom_setsym(a+5, gensym("@description"));
00031                 atom_setsym(a+6, gensym(description));
00032                 jcom_core_loadextern(gensym(classname), 7, a, &theObject);
00033         }
00034         
00035         ~hubInternalObject()
00036         {
00037                 object_free(theObject);
00038         }
00039 };
00040 
00041 
00042 void hub_internals_create(t_hub *x)
00043 {
00044         hubInternalObject       *anObject;
00045 
00046         x->hash_internals = hashtab_new(0);
00047 
00048         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "init",                                         "msg_none",             "none", "Initialize a module completely to the original state.");
00049         anObject->action = (method)hub_init;
00050         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("init"), (t_object*)anObject);
00051 
00052         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "documentation/generate",       "msg_none",             "none", "Generate a documentation page for this module and save it to disk.");
00053         anObject->action = (method)hub_autodoc;
00054         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("documentation/generate"), (t_object*)anObject);
00055 
00056         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "module/view_internals",        "msg_none",             "none", "Attempts to open the internal algorithm for viewing.  This works for most modules.  Some modules may choose to cloak the algorithms - preventing this message from functioning.");
00057         anObject->action = (method)hub_module_view_alg;
00058         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("module/view_internals"), (t_object*)anObject);
00059 
00060         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/read",                          "msg_symbol",   "none", "Open an xml-preset file and recall the first preset in that file.  An optional argument defines the file to open.");
00061         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_read;
00062         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/read"), (t_object*)anObject);
00063 
00064         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/write",                         "msg_symbol",   "none", "Write an xml-preset file to disk.  An optional argument defines the file to open.");
00065         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_write;
00066         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/write"), (t_object*)anObject);
00067 
00068         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/recall",                        "msg_generic",  "none", "Recall a preset by number - you can also choose presets from the module menu.");
00069         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_recall;
00070         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/recall"), (t_object*)anObject);
00071 
00072         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/copy",                          "msg_list",             "none", "Create a new preset (2nd argument) by copying the contents of another preset (1st argument)");
00073         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_copy;
00074         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/copy"), (t_object*)anObject);
00075 
00076         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/store",                         "msg_list",             "none", "Store a preset by number in memory.  All presets present in memory will be written to disk when you send a save_settings message to the module.");
00077         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_store;
00078         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/store"), (t_object*)anObject);
00079 
00080         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/storenext",                     "msg_list",             "none", "Store a preset in the next preset slot.  Handy so that you do not need to specify a preset number manually.");
00081         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_store_next;
00082         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/storenext"), (t_object*)anObject);
00083 
00084         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/interpolate",           "msg_list",             "none", "Interpolate between two named presets (argument 1 and 2) using a ratio (float in the range [0.0, 1.0]) specified as the third argument.");
00085         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_interpolate;
00086         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/interpolate"), (t_object*)anObject);
00087 
00088         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/default",                       "msg_none",             "none", "Open the default preset file and recall the first preset in that file.");
00089         anObject->action = (method)hub_preset_default;
00090         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/default"), (t_object*)anObject);
00091 
00092         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/clear",                         "msg_none",             "none", "Clears all presets, providing a blank slate for saving new presets.");
00093         anObject->action = (method)hub_presets_clear;
00094         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/clear"), (t_object*)anObject);
00095 
00096         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "preset/post",                          "msg_none",             "none", "Post all presets to the Max window.");
00097         anObject->action = (method)hub_presets_dump;
00098         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("preset/post"), (t_object*)anObject);
00099 
00100         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.parameter",      "ui/freeze",                            "msg_toggle",   "none", "Turn off the updating of user interface elements when parameters change.  This may be done to conserve CPU resources.");
00101         anObject->action = (method)hub_ui_freeze;
00102         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("ui/freeze"), (t_object*)anObject);
00103 
00104         anObject = new hubInternalObject("jcom.message",        "ui/refresh",                           "msg_none",             "none", "Update displayed values for module to reflect current state.");
00105         anObject->action = (method)hub_ui_refresh;
00106         hashtab_store(x->hash_internals, gensym("ui/refresh"), (t_object*)anObject);
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 void hub_internals_destroy(t_hub *x)
00111 {
00112         long                            i;
00113         long                            numKeys = 0;
00114         t_symbol                        **keys = NULL;
00115         hubInternalObject       *anObject;
00116         t_max_err                       err;
00117         
00118         hashtab_getkeys(x->hash_internals, &numKeys, &keys);
00119         for(i=0; i<numKeys; i++){
00120                 err = hashtab_lookup(x->hash_internals, keys[i], (t_object**)&anObject);
00121                 if(!err)
00122                         delete anObject;
00123         }
00124 
00125         if(keys)
00126                 sysmem_freeptr(keys);
00127                 
00128         hashtab_chuck(x->hash_internals);
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 void hub_internals_dispatch(t_hub *x, t_symbol *osc_name, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00133 {
00134         hubInternalObject       *theObject;
00135         t_max_err                       err;
00136         
00137         err = hashtab_lookup(x->hash_internals, osc_name, (t_object**)&theObject);
00138         if(!err)
00139                 theObject->action(x, osc_name, argc, argv);
00140 }
